title: Trusting His Mate
description: At long last, Rogue Alpha shifter Logan Dix and his Mate Kristof Two-Feather have settled into domestic bliss…sort of. Kristof’s tendency to disappear without warning arouses Dix’s suspicions. When Kristof is rumored to be linked to the assassination of a drug cartel mole, Dix starts poking around and discovers secrets Kristof has fought hard to keep hidden. But unearthing Kristof’s secrets comes at a high price: his trust in Dix. It’s the one thing Kristof can’t forgive—nor can Dix restore his shattered faith in his mate. Can their relationship be salvaged? It’s not looking good as the clock winds down and the ugly revelations start piling up. A 17,000 word novella. Book 3 in the Rogue Alpha Series. Claiming His Mate – Rogue Alpha Series Book 1 Taming His Mate – Rogue Alpha Series Book 2
author: Lissa Ford
